lead_paragraph: “I have betrayed your trust,” said Marion Jones, who won five track-and-field medals at the 2000 Sydney Olympics.
snippet: “I have betrayed your trust,” said Marion Jones, who won five track-and-field medals at the 2000 Sydney Olympics.
